entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
